content: stndst from previous round 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in stndst from previous round 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 dcs 3 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 3 half_double_crochet over chain space 4 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 4 half_double_crochet in each of next 6 dcs 5 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 5 half_double_crochet over chain space 6 double_crochet in each of the next three double_crochet stitches 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 six times 7 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 7 half_double_crochet in each of the last 2 dcs 8 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 8 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 9 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches stitch count 56 half_double_crochet 10 repeat steps 6 to 9 five times slip_stitch finishing round optional 11 double_crochet in next last stitch 12 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 slip_stitch in every stitch around careful to maintain same gauge as previous half_double_crochet round stitch count 49 double_crochet and 7 chain 1 space or if you prefer work a round of crab stitch or spin stitch4 round 11b third round diamond flower 2 double_crochet spacing 1 to commence the round stndst in stndst from previous round 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 4 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 5 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 6 double_crochet in each of the next two double_crochet stitches 7 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 8 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 9 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 10 repeat steps 6 to 9 six times 11 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 48 double_crochet and 8 chain 1 space round 12a half_double_crochet in all stitches around 3 double_crochet spacing 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in stndst from previous round 4 refer to the crochet fix spin stitch youtube video for those of you who find crab stitch difficult to work this is an alternative option that results in the same finish page | 5 vintage vibes twice as nice baby beanie image 3 6 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches 7 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and the first chain of the next previous round 3 work the first four rounds as per simple and sweet pattern substitute the simple and chain sweet pattern rounds 5 onwards with the rounds detailed below 8 slip_stitch in the second middle chain of the next previous round 3 chain 9 chain 3 and skip the third chain of the previous round 3 chain and the next 2 double_crochet stitches note the slip_stitch that finishes each round does not count as a stitch for stitch count 10 repeat steps 6 to 9
